19/05/2023
Did you already submit a Privay and Ethics (PRET) application? If so, then include that number in the DMP where you describe the ethical and privacy issues.

For future sharing of pseudonimised interview transcripts it's best to use KU Leuven RDR (not Zenodo), as such data still count as personal data under GDPR so will need access restrictions.
